name: vovk-hello-world
description: A showcase app built with Next.js + Vovk.ts + Zod. For more details, visit https://vovk.dev/hello-world

scripts.#comment1: --- Demo scripts for running examples in different languages ---
scripts.demo:local: npm run demo:node:local && npm run demo:rust:local && npm run demo:python:local
scripts.demo:packaged: npm run demo:node:packaged && npm run demo:rust:packaged && npm run demo:python:packaged
scripts.demo:all: npm run demo:local && npm run demo:packaged
scripts.#comment2: --- Installation scripts for the vovk-hello-world package in different languages ---
scripts.install:all: npm run install:node && npm run install:rust && npm run install:python
scripts.git-tag: git add . && git commit -m "chore: release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.check-uncommitted: git diff --quiet && git diff --cached --quiet || (echo '‚ùå Uncommitted changes!' && exit 1)
scripts.postversion: vovk generate && vovk bundle && npm run publish:node && npm run publish:rust && npm run publish:python && npm run git-tag
scripts.patch: npm run check-uncommitted && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
